text: Create new ger2 project:

title: good enuff code files — ger_code
text: Create code folder import, tidy, wrangle, visualize,     model, data .R files.

title: good enuff code files — ger_code
text: folder_name name folder code files (string) header include roxygen2 headers?

title: good enuff code files — ger_code
text: header `FALSE`, code files created standard script    header.

title: good enuff data folders — ger_data
text: Create data folders, inst/extdata folder,     data.md file

title: good enuff R documentation — ger_docs
text: Create docs folder docs/notebook.Rmd, docs/manuscript.Rmd,     changelog.md files.

title: Fun script header <(+_+)> — ger_fun_headr
text: fun_headr function similar hot keys 'cmd + shift + R' creating section header.

title: Fun script header <(+_+)> — ger_fun_headr
text: name

title: Fun script header <(+_+)> — ger_fun_headr
code: # use this to create a fun section header in any .R file # with RStudio running... # geR2::fun_headr("import")

what: Insert good enuff R script header — ger_headr
title: Insert good enuff R script header — ger_headr
text: ger_headr() function can used new R script     create header. header includes sections : - code creates - author - MIT License - Version

title: Insert good enuff R script header — ger_headr
Insert good enuff R script header — ger_headr
code: # use this to create a script header (with RStudio open) # ger_headr("import")

what: Create a new good enuff R project — ger_proj
title: Create a new good enuff R project — ger_proj
text: Create open new 'good enough' project.

title: Create a new good enuff R project — ger_proj
Create a new good enuff R project — ger_proj
text: parent_dir parent folder project proj_name name project

title: Create a new good enuff R project — ger_proj
text: `ger_proj()` function open new RStudio project.     `parent_dir` folder contain new project,     `proj_name` name new sub-folder.     navigate folders computer, like use `dir()` function.     start `dir("/")`, able find folders     permissions (probably best start `"/Users"`).

title: Create a new good enuff R project — ger_proj
code: # not run # use dir() to find the parent folder path. # ger_proj(parent_dir = "/Users/mjfrigaard/Documents/", "my new project")

title: good enuff R setup — ger_setup
text: ger_setup() wrapper around `ger_code()`, `ger_data()`,     `ger_docs()` functions. intended easy setup     new project.

title: good enuff R setup — ger_setup
code: ger_setup(code = TRUE, data = TRUE, docs = TRUE)

title: good enuff R setup — ger_setup
text: code logical, include results code files? data logical, include data folder files? docs logical, include docs folder files?

title: geR2 0.1.0
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
